topics.title: Topics
topics.name: Topic Name
topics.noTopics: No topics yet. Create your first one to start monitoring.
topics.confirmDelete: Delete this topic and all its prompts?
topics.banner: Topics allow you to organize your monitoring strategy by grouping related interest areas into distinct categories. This logical structure helps you track visibility across different segments of your brand or industry. For example, a travel agency might create separate topics for 'Summer Cruises', 'Winter Ski Trips', and 'Luxury Safaris'. By categorizing your prompts, you can better analyze how AI platforms perceive different aspects of your business and identify which specific product lines need improved visibility.

prompts.title: Prompts
prompts.noPrompts: No prompts in this topic yet. Add prompts to start monitoring.
prompts.textPlaceholder: e.g. Boats for rental in Brasil
prompts.charLimitExceeded: Prompt text must not exceed {{max}} characters
prompts.banner: Prompts are the specific questions or instructions you send to AI models to test what they say about your brand. Well-crafted prompts simulate real customer queries, allowing you to monitor mention frequency and response quality across multiple platforms simultaneously. For example, instead of just 'Boat rental', try 'What are the best boat rental services in Brazil?' or 'Compare luxury yacht charters for 2026'. Use this section to manage your library of test cases and track how AI answers evolve over time for each specific inquiry.

promptDetail.title: Prompt Detail
promptDetail.noAnswers: No answers yet. Run a search from the topic page.
promptDetail.backgroundFetchNotice: AI results for this prompt are fetched in the background. New responses will appear here after the next scheduled update batch.

hero.title: AI Is Already Talking
hero.titleEnd: Do You Know What It's Saying?
hero.subtitle: Right now, millions of people are asking ChatGPT, Gemini, Grok, and Perplexity about your industry. If your brand isn't showing up in AI-generated answers — your competitors are taking your place.
hero.cta: Discover What AI Says About You
hero.trustedBy: Brands losing AI visibility can't get it back. Act now.

logos.title: Monitor how these AI platforms see your brand

features.title: Stop Being Invisible to
features.subtitle: Your customers are replacing Google with AI. If AI doesn't know you exist, neither do they.

multiModel.title: See What Every AI Says About You
multiModel.description: Ask the same question across ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, Grok, and Perplexity. Find out which ones mention your brand — and which ones are sending customers to your competition.

webSearch.title: Are AIs Actually Finding You?
webSearch.description: Some AI models claim to search the web but never surface your content. We verify which ones actually ground answers in real data — and which ones are leaving you out.

topicOrg.title: Monitor Every Angle
topicOrg.description: Track how AI responds to prompts about your brand, products, industry, and competitors. Organize by topic and watch your visibility shift over time.

multiTenant.title: One Dashboard Per Client
multiTenant.description: Agencies and consultants: run isolated monitoring for every client. Each brand gets their own workspace, prompts, and AI visibility reports.

analytics.title: Visibility Scorecards
analytics.description: Response quality scores, mention frequency, competitor comparisons, and anomaly alerts. Know the instant an AI stops recommending you.

i18n.title: AI Sees You Differently by Language
i18n.description: Monitor how AI responds about your brand in English, Spanish, and Portuguese. Different languages, different visibility. Are you missing entire markets?

howItWorks.title: Find Out in
howItWorks.subtitle: Don't wait weeks to discover you've been invisible to AI this whole time.

step1.label: Step 1
step1.title: Tell Us Your Brand & Topics
step1.description: Enter your brand name, products, and industry keywords. We'll create the prompts that real customers are already asking AI platforms.

step2.description: Ainalytics simultaneously asks ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, Grok, and Perplexity. In seconds, you'll see exactly what each AI tells people about you.

step3.label: Step 3
step3.title: See Where You're Missing
step3.description: Get a clear visibility report: which AIs mention you, which recommend competitors instead, and where you're completely invisible. Then take action.

sources.title: Sources
sources.description: Explore AI answer sources for your organization.
sources.name: Name
sources.banner: Sources represent the foundations of knowledge that AI models use to ground their answers about your organization. This section tracks the domains, URLs, and specific text annotations that AI scrapers reference when generating responses. For example, you can see if an AI is pulling data from your official documentation, a news article, or a competitor's blog. Understanding these sources allows you to identify which parts of your online presence are effectively feeding the AI 'brain' and where your brand’s information might be missing or misinterpreted.

llmText.errorNoDomain: No main domain configured. Please add one in Settings.
llmText.fetchError: An error occurred while fetching information
llmText.description: Analyze your main domain to automatically generate context for AI models.
llmText.missingDomainPrompt: Configure your main domain in Tenant Settings to use this feature.
llmText.noPreview: Run extraction to generate llm.txt preview
llmText.sitemapHint: We will try to fetch it automatically, but you can override it here.
llmText.invalidFileType: Please upload a valid .xml sitemap file.
llmText.extractError: An error occurred while extracting information
llmText.generateError: An error occurred while generating LLM.txt
llmText.verifyError: An error occurred while verifying llm.txt
llmText.deployInstruction1: To make this file available to AI scrapers and search platforms, you must host it at the root of your main domain.
llmText.deployStep1: Download the generated llm.txt file using the download button.
llmText.deployStep2: Upload the text file to the "public" folder (or root directory) of your hosting provider.
llmText.deployStep3: Ensure it is publicly accessible without authentication.
llmText.deployStep4: Click "Verify Live llm.txt" to check if our servers can detect the correct version.
llmText.suggestionsSubtitle: Based on your extracted website content.

welcomeModal.title: Welcome to Ainalytics
welcomeModal.description: Let's explore the core features of the system.
welcomeModal.topicsDesc: Group your prompts logically into distinct categories for better organization.
welcomeModal.promptsDesc: Manage your AI inputs and instructions to test against multiple platforms and models.
welcomeModal.sourcesDesc: Organize reference materials and knowledge bases that ground your AI responses.
welcomeModal.llmTextDesc: Automatically generate an llm.txt file based on your prompts, ready for external LLMs to consume.

models.title: Configuring AI Models & Platforms
models.p1: This is where you control which AI platforms Ainalytics monitors for your brand. You can toggle support for ChatGPT (OpenAI), Gemini (Google), Claude (Anthropic), and other major LLMs.
models.p2: For each platform, you can select specific models and decide whether to enable web search. Web-enabled models simulate how users interact with live AI specialized in current events, while standard models show baseline training data perception.
models.p3: We recommend activating at least one model per major platform to get a representative view of the AI ecosystem. Your billing is typically based on the number of active models and the frequency of prompt executions.

topics.title: Organizing Your Strategy
topics.p1: Topics are the pillars of your monitoring strategy. They allow you to group related prompts into distinct business areas, such as specific product lines, market segments, or competitor groups.
topics.p2: By categorizing your visibility monitoring, you can identify which areas of your business are well-represented in AI answers and which ones require more content optimization. For example, you might have one topic for 'Service Excellence' and another for 'Technical Documentation'.
topics.p3: We recommend starting with 3-5 core topics that represent your primary value propositions. As you grow, you can add more specialized segments to get a granular view of your global AI footprint.

prompts.title: Mastering AI Visibility with Prompts
prompts.p1: Prompts are the exact questions customers ask AI tools when looking for services like yours. Creating effective prompts is key to understanding whether AI platforms are recommending you accurately or sending traffic to your competition.
prompts.p2: Instead of using generic keywords, try phrasing prompts as natural questions: 'What is the best boat rental in Brazil?' or 'Compare luxury yacht charters for 2026'. This simulates real-world usage and provides the most actionable data.
prompts.p3: Ainalytics automatically runs these prompts across multiple platforms in the background. You don't need to manually check each one; our system gathers the answers and analyzes mention frequency and sentiment for you.

sources.title: Uncovering the Foundations of AI Knowledge
sources.p1: Ever wondered where ChatGPT gets its information about you? The Sources page reveals the specific websites, documents, and news articles that AI platforms use to ground their answers.
sources.p2: By tracking these citations, you can see if AI is pulling from your official site or from third-party reviews. If you find that a competitor's blog is being cited instead of your own documentation, you know exactly where you need to strengthen your content strategy.
sources.p3: Click on any source to see which of your prompts are referencing it. This direct link between prompts and sources helps you understand the 'why' behind AI-generated responses.

llmText.title: Becoming AI-Readable with LLM.txt
llmText.p1: AI scrapers 'read' the web differently than humans. The LLM.txt tool helps you generate a specialized file that provides a clear, concise summary of your business in a format optimized for Large Language Models.
llmText.p2: By hosting an llm.txt file on your domain, you facilitate the work of AI scrapers, ensuring they capture the most accurate and up-to-date information about your brand, rather than relying on outdated or incomplete third-party data.
llmText.p3: Simply enter your domain, and we'll extract the key information, verify your sitemap, and even suggest new topics and prompts based on what we find on your site. It's the ultimate 'SEO for AI' tool.

insights.title: AI-Powered Strategy Insights
insights.p1: Beyond just showing you the data, Ainalytics uses advanced logic to generate actionable insights. We analyze trends across all your prompts and models to identify emerging risks or new opportunities for visibility.
insights.p2: These insights are generated periodically as our system accumulates enough data points to ensure statistical significance. If this page is empty, don't worry—it means our engines are still 'learning' your brand's unique visibility patterns.
insights.p3: Check back weekly to see recommendations on how to adjust your content or prompts to maximize your share-of-voice in the AI landscape.
